data.title: Stacey Dash
data.text:
AKA Stacey Lauretta Dash

Born: 20-Jan-1966

Birthplace: Bronx, NY

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: Multiracial [1]

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Dee Davenport on TV's Clueless

Cousin of hip-hop mogul Damon Dash.

[1] African-American and Mexican.

Brother: Darien Dash (CEO of DME Interactive Holdings)

Boyfriend: Christopher Williams (ex-, one son)

Son: Austin

Husband: Brian Lovell (m. 16-Jul-1999)

Husband: Emmanuel Xuereb (actor, b. 1965, m. 2007, sep. 2010, div. 30-Sep-2011)

High School: Paramus High School, Paramus, NJ

TELEVISION

Single Ladies Val (2011)

The Game Camille Rose (2009-11)

The Strip Vanessa Weir (1999-2000)

Clueless Dee Davenport (1996-99)

TV 101 Monique (1988-89)

St. Elsewhere Penny (1988)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Dysfunctional Friends (3-Feb-2012)

Phantom Punch (2008) · Geraldine Liston

I Could Never Be Your Woman (11-May-2007) · Brianna

Getting Played (10-Dec-2005)

Lethal Eviction (10-Mar-2005)

Hustle and Heat (4-Nov-2003) · Real Venus

Gang of Roses (10-Oct-2003)

View from the Top (21-Mar-2003) · Angela

Paper Soldiers (18-Mar-2003) · Tamika

Soldiers of Change (27-Oct-2001)

Cold Around the Heart (7-Nov-1997)

Illegal in Blue (29-Aug-1995)

Clueless (19-Jul-1995)

Renaissance Man (3-Jun-1994)

Mo' Money (24-Jul-1992)

Tennessee Waltz (6-Aug-1989) · Minnie

Moving (4-Mar-1988) · Casey Pear

Enemy Territory (22-May-1987)
